short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide stars, followers and watchers in GitHub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Why?

I don't want my heart to be disturbed by the "Â±", especially during coding and research.

## Usage

By default, stars are hidden as much as possible.
Some features can be hidden by enabling them on the Options page.

## Suppressible GitHub stats

- User
- Repository index
- Repository detail
- Pinned Repositories
- "Explore repositories" and/or the stars
- Sponsors
- Sponsoring
- Achievements
- Highlights

### Suppressible third party stats

- [GitHub Readme Stats](https://github.com/anuraghazra/github-readme-stats)
